ovdesc.p: Defines the Challenge Response methods per version

desc.p: To indicate the start range of the field value.
The actual Question that is to be shown to the end-user
ID of the challenge response (i.e REAL etc).
Description of the flow intended from this record
Indicates the end range of the field value.
Indicate the field name to be used for Challenge response method.
This field indicates the starting of the associated Multi set. More than one field can be defined for challenge response method per version.
Restrictions on the data that can be entered into the token device as a challenge:
• Must be at least 4 digits (although we could pad with zeros)
• Must be a maximum of 8 digits
